name: Tengoku 3: 楓葉呪 〜 Lament of Autumn Maiden [Demo]
name_original: Tengoku 3: 楓葉呪 〜 Lament of Autumn Maiden [Demo]
description:
This is the demo version of the game. The full version will be released for free.

Fullscreen is recommended. The browser version may not run well on older devices, so a download for windows is also available. If the game loses focus, try left clicking on the window, or refreshing the page.

Check out the other Tengoku Project games here! https://itch.io/c/1985316/tengoku-project

Controls Move / Navigate menus [Arrow Keys] / [WASD] / (D-pad) Shoot / Confirm (in menus) [Z] / [J] / (A) Bomb / Back (in menus) [X] / [K] / (X) Slow Movement [Shift] / (Left Trigger) Pause [Space] / (Menu Button) Toggle FullscreenAlt + Enter Hints
  • Collect cursed leaves from enemies to increase your power and enter Curse Mode
  • When in Curse Mode, the bar drains slower if you aren't shooting
  • Your score is multiplied while in Curse Mode
  • If you collect extra cursed leaves while you already have 3 active, it will spawn regular leaves to collect
